document_data.name: Elthaeris
document_data.mainbody:
'''Elthaeris''' was a [[Chosen of Mystra]], once the First among her Chosen.
{{quote|No more. I find that 'First among Her Chosen' has become an empty boast. Find another fool to be your slave down the centuries, lady. Everyone I loved... everyone I knew... is dead and gone, my work is swept away by each new grasping generation of spell hurlers, Faer√ªn fades into a pale shadow of the glory I saw in my youth... and most of all, I'm... so... damned... tired...|Last words of Elthaeris.}}
document_data.Description: During his last moments, Elthaeris wore a high-collared, ornate robe.
document_data.Personality: At the moment of his death, Elthaeris was consumed with weariness. According to [[Uirkymbrand]], another Chosen, he had a reputation for being overbearing.
document_data.Possessions: He carried at least one [[enchanted]] ''staff'', which exploded when broken; most certainly, the staff was capable of a retributive strike.
document_data.History:
Elthaeris was anointed as a [[Chosen of Mystra]] at some point after her rise in {{yearlink|-339}}.{{Cite web/theedverse/2022-12-30 - Chosen of Mystra and of Mystryl}}

In a vision of the past shown to [[Elminster Aumar]] in the {{yearlinkName|767}}, Elthaeris had just slain a woman; at that point, he gave up on his service to Mystra and proclaimed he was done after centuries. He broke his enchanted [[staff]], stabbing himself with one end as it exploded.
